testimonials.description: I wish this was around 15 years ago. I love it.
I have waited 28 years for a simple program to communicate well with our clients.
Awesome software. Saves time & more accurate than a standard analysis. More importantly, it's best for our Buyers & Sellers.
cmaIQ is without a doubt the most helpful, time saving tool in the business. Now that I utilize this tool daily, I don't know how I was able to operate my business without it.
This App is awesome. Easy to use and a great visual.

cmaIQ is a completely new revolutionary way to accurately predict selling price. I have saved many hours of research and been able to show my clients exactly what the house will sell for without argument.
cmaIQ has completely changed the way I view and communicate home values with customers. Truly revolutionary. I wish I had this 4 years ago!
I’ve already created so many reports and got a total of 30K in scheduled reductions. I’m officially your #1 Fan!!!
I love this tool. Easy to read and understand. Lots of comparison. Fantastic and essential for buying, selling.
cmaIQ has been a complete game changer for my business. One of the most helpful and easy to use tools, it has become a staple in my real estate.
cmaIQ is revolutionary. It gets to the core of accurate pricing and gives me that much more confidence in conveying value to my clients.
cmaIQ saves so much time in trying to determine the value of a property.
I will use this software with every future client.

Our team uses cmaIQ on a daily basis. It has been incredibly valuable to us and has become our first option to determine market value. We prepare an cmaIQ for every listing appointment and include it in our new agent training. I can not recommend it highly enough.

I have found cmaIQ to be an indispensable tool for both buyer and seller clients to assist them in better illustrating the reasonable market range and position of a property in conjunction with other reports. The interactive platform quickly translates in contrast to the one dimensional CMA which provides little context or frame of reference.

cmaIQ is awesome! So great. I'm speechless. Helped me encourage my buyers to write an offer. They were worried that the sellers were overpriced. Multiple offers on a million dollar house. We got the house! I love it!
